Class Hardware.Switches

  • java.lang.Object

    public static final class Hardware.Switches
extends Object
    Factory method for different kinds of switches.

      Create an analog switch sensor that is triggered when the value exceeds the specified upper voltage and that is no longer triggered when the value drops below the specified lower voltage.

    • Method Detail

      • normallyClosed

        public static Switch normallyClosed(int channel)
        Create a generic normally closed digital switch sensor on the specified digital channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the switch is connected to
        Returns:
        a switch on the specified channel

      • normallyOpen

        public static Switch normallyOpen(int channel)
        Create a generic normally open digital switch sensor on the specified digital channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the switch is connected to
        Returns:
        a switch on the specified channel

      • analog

        public static Switch analog(int channel,
                            double lowerVoltage,
                            double upperVoltage,
                            Hardware.Switches.AnalogOption option,
                            Hardware.Switches.TriggerMode mode)
        Create an analog switch sensor that is triggered when the value exceeds the specified upper voltage and that is no longer triggered when the value drops below the specified lower voltage.
        Parameters:
        channel - the port to use for the analog trigger 0-3 are on-board, 4-7 are on the MXP port
        lowerVoltage - the lower voltage limit that below which will result in the switch no longer being triggered
        upperVoltage - the upper voltage limit that above which will result in triggering the switch
        option - the trigger option; may not be null
        mode - the trigger mode; may not be null
        Returns:
        the analog switch; never null
